s: May 14, 2019 - Significant additional protections ... and most breweries should consider registering both brand names and individual beer names. Registration provides nationwide notice and evidence of priority, unlocks statutory damages against counterfeiters, and makes it less difficult to obtain other remedies such as lost profits, treble damages (financial compensation awarded to a prevailing plaintiff that are three times the actual compensation), and attorneys’ fees.
